name: Panic Wave
description:
Game:

Panic Wave is a two player fighting game where no physical attacks can be performed.  Player "attacks" by falling in mid-air and causing waves which hurt the other players.  Players can also create waves by picking up and throwing blocks.  Also the stage loops around.

Controls:

A/D or <- / -> : move left and right

W or ↑ : Jump when on ground and Fall when  in mid-air

S or ↓ : Pick up blocks while colliding with the green blocks / throw blocks

WASD controls for player 1, Arrow keys for player 2
